snippet: The disparities are especially evident when comparing earners in top-tier coastal cities and those in interior provinces.
abstract: Results of wide-ranging survey of Chinese family wealth and living habits released by Peking University show wide gap in income between nation's top earners and those at the bottom, and a vast difference between earners in top-tier coastal cities and those in interior provinces.
lead_paragraph: The disparities are especially evident when comparing earners in top-tier coastal cities and those in interior provinces.

headline.main: Survey in China Shows a Wide Gap in Income
headline.print_headline: Survey in China Shows A Wide Gap in Income
